item.title: Israel Launches New Ground Incursion in Lebanon, Raising Fears for Truce
item.description: Israel has been conducting near-daily strikes against what it says are Hezbollah targets as the Iranian-backed group comes under pressure to disarm am...

item.title: Recipients of a U.S. Climate Science Fellowship Are Put on Unpaid Leave
item.description: Researchers in the NOAA program were furloughed because funds to pay them were not available.

item.title: Trump to Discuss Economic Investment With African Leaders at White House Meeting
item.description: The administration is aiming to strike deals to expand the United States’ access to critical minerals and to counter China’s rising influence in Afric...

item.title: French Police Raid National Rally Over Campaign Finances
item.description: The authorities said they were investigating whether the nationalist, anti-immigrant party broke France’s campaign-finance rules.

item.title: New Research Questions Severity of Withdrawal From Antidepressants
item.description: Warnings about withdrawal from antidepressants have rippled through society in recent years. A new study claims they are overblown.
